definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: I mean, you're a grown woman.
sentences.chinese: 她長大後成爲一位亭亭玉立的女子。

sentences.english: Her face was pink, too. This made her like a slim and graceful flower.
sentences.chinese: 她的臉也是粉紅色的，象一朵亭亭玉立的花。

sentences.english: Your daughter is now quite a woman.
sentences.chinese: 你女兒如今已是亭亭玉立的女子了。

sentences.english: She has turned into a slim and graceful girl in the years we have been apart.
sentences.chinese: 幾年沒見她已經長成亭亭玉立的大姑娘了。

sentences.english: The little girl becomes a pretty young lady.
sentences.chinese: 小女娃變成了亭亭玉立的少女。

sentences.english: Time went by quickly and the little girl has turned into a beautiful woman.
sentences.chinese: 時間轉眼消逝，小女孩已變得亭亭玉立了。

sentences.english: President to talk with people such as standing, should be slim.
sentences.chinese: 女士如站立與人交談，也應亭亭玉立。

sentences.english: After world war ii, she quickly is blossoming into a graceful girl.
sentences.chinese: 二戰結束後，她很快出落成一位亭亭玉立的少女。

sentences.english: The sunflowers stretched tall and proud to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 向日葵在陽光中亭亭玉立。

sentences.english: I want to see her babies, but chances are slim.
sentences.chinese: 我想要看她的嬰孩，但機會是亭亭玉立的。

sentences.english: She has blossomed into a beautiful young woman.
sentences.chinese: 她已經亭亭玉立，成了美麗的少女。

sentences.english: She had an erectness of carriage, an ease of bearing, a poise that clearly indicated the best of breeding.
sentences.chinese: 她亭亭玉立，體態優雅，這一切都說明她出身高貴。

sentences.english: She grew up to be a lovely woman.
sentences.chinese: 她長大後成爲一位亭亭玉立的女子。

sentences.english: Her slim and graceful figure makes the gray city bright and intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 她的亭亭玉立，可以讓這個灰色的城市變得靈性十足。

sentences.english: Her slim and graceful figure, left me a deep impression.
sentences.chinese: 她那亭亭玉立的身影，給我留下了深刻的印象。

definition: to grow (prettier etc)/to mature into/to blossom
to have bright eyes and white teeth
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
sweet, fair, and graceful (of a woman)/a seductive woman/secluded (bower)
